article:
:Unless
otherwise specified, Chinese texts in this article are written in ([[Simplified
Chinese]]/[[Traditional Chinese]]; [[Pinyin]]) format. In cases where Simplified
and Traditional Chinese scripts are identical, the Chinese term is written once.
